mapper.select: SELECT product_no AS productNo, product_brand AS productBrand, product_name AS productName, product_img AS productImg, stock AS stock, TO_CHAR(receive_dt, 'YYYY . MM . DD') AS receiveDt, receive_loc AS receiveLoc FROM product where receive_dt >= SYSDATE and receive_loc=#{storeName}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN b.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'false' THEN 1 END) AS notReceive, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'true' THEN 1 END) AS Receive FROM product a JOIN PRODUCT_HISTORY b ON a.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO WHERE a.product_no = #{productNo} GROUP BY a.PRODUCT_NO

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN b.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'false' THEN 1 END) AS notReceive, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'true' THEN 1 END) AS receive, to_char(b.PRODUCT_HISTORY_DT, 'yy-mm-dd') AS historyDate, a.PRODUCT_NO as productNo FROM product a JOIN PRODUCT_HISTORY b ON a.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO WHERE a.PRODUCT_NO = #{prodNo} GROUP BY to_char(b.PRODUCT_HISTORY_DT, 'yy-mm-dd'), a.PRODUCT_NO

SELECT a.PRODUCT_HISTORY_No as productHistoryNo, CASE WHEN LENGTH(b.MEMBER_NAME) > 2 THEN SUBSTR(b.MEMBER_NAME, 1, 1) || ' * ' || SUBSTR(b.MEMBER_NAME, LENGTH(b.MEMBER_NAME)) ELSE SUBSTR(b.MEMBER_NAME, 1, 1) || ' * ' END as memberName, to_char(a.PRODUCT_HISTORY_DT, 'yy.mm.dd') as historyDate, CASE WHEN a.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'cancel' THEN '취소' WHEN a.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'true' THEN '수령' ELSE '미수령' END as productStatus FROM PRODUCT_HISTORY a INNER JOIN member b ON a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{prodNo}
